member.name: T:BioNovoGene.BioDeep.MSFinder.ExistFormulaQuery
member.summary: This is the class variable to store the internal query of molecular formula. The queries are stored in .EFD file of the same folder of main program (should be). The EFD file will be retrieved by ExistFormulaDbParcer.cs.

member.name: T:BioNovoGene.BioDeep.MSFinder.FormulaGenerator
member.summary: This class is the main program to find the molecular formula candidates from the mass spectra and to rank them.

member.name: M:BioNovoGene.BioDeep.MSFinder.FormulaGenerator.#ctor(BioNovoGene.BioDeep.MSFinder.AnalysisParamOfMsfinder)
member.summary: This is the constructor of this program. The parameters will be set by the user-defined paramerters.
This is the main method to find the formula candidates. MS-FINDER program now utilizes three internal databases including formulaDB, neutralLossDB, and existFormulaDB.
